metadata.title: Azure Network Engineer Associate
metadata.subtitle: Build the Networks That Power the World's Cloud Infrastructure
metadata.description: Every cloud application depends on a network that just works. This course transforms you from a network administrator into a cloud network architect who designs the invisible infrastructure that billions of users rely on every day. You'll master Azure networking that scales globally, secures critical data, and connects the world's most demanding applications - the skills that separate network engineers who get hired from those who don't.
prerequisites: Basic knowledge of on-premises networking, routing, and firewalls
A desire to build networks that never fail and always perform

highlights: Design networks that handle billions of connections daily
Build security that protects the world's most valuable data
Master global load balancing for instant worldwide access
Join the elite engineers who keep the internet running

overview.summary: In the cloud era, networks are the invisible foundation that everything else depends on. This course teaches you the Azure networking skills that separate the network engineers who design resilient, scalable infrastructure from those who just configure routers. You'll learn to build virtual networks that span continents, implement security that protects against nation-state attacks, and create load balancing solutions that handle millions of users simultaneously. By the end, you'll have the technical mastery and architectural vision to lead cloud networking initiatives at any global organization.
objectives: Design virtual network architectures that scale infinitely
Implement routing solutions that optimize global traffic flow
Build network security that protects critical business assets
Create monitoring systems that predict and prevent network failures
Architect private connectivity solutions for hybrid cloud environments
Design network integrations that connect legacy systems to the cloud
overview.targetAudience: This course is for network engineers ready to become cloud architects. Whether you're a traditional network admin wanting to add cloud expertise, a systems engineer ready to embrace cloud networking, or someone who wants to build the infrastructure that powers global applications - if you want to design networks that never fail and always perform, this course will give you the skills and mindset to become the network engineer that companies compete for.

faq.question: Do I need networking experience?
faq.answer: Yes, you should have basic networking knowledge including TCP/IP, routing, and firewalls. This course builds on those fundamentals.

faq.question: Is this course technical?
faq.answer: Yes, this course is very technical and focuses on implementing Azure networking solutions. You'll work extensively with Azure portal and CLI.

faq.question: What Azure services will I learn?
faq.answer: You'll learn Virtual Networks, VPN Gateway, ExpressRoute, Load Balancer, Application Gateway, Azure Firewall, and network monitoring tools.

faq.question: Are there hands-on labs?
faq.answer: Yes, extensive hands-on labs where you'll build complete Azure networking solutions and troubleshoot network issues.
